Delivery attempted, parcel not left
1) Please only leave a parcel where it will not be stolen:

1) Most unit blocks mail rooms are unsafe location.
2) Foyers are unsafe.
3) Letter boxes are unsafe.
4) Front doors which can be seen from the road are unsafe.
2) Please treat the parcel as if it was a pile of your own cash :)
This delivery requires an ID check!
Please enter last 4 digits of the recipients Driving licence

This will allow you to create and manage a team of drivers. 
Once the team has been setup, you’ll be able to invite your drivers to use the Zoom2u app to carry out and complete delivery work together.

Note:
You will be entirely responsible to the work carried out by everyone in your team.
You will be paid for any deliveries the team collectively completes, and will be responsible for compensating them for the work they do.
Everyone will be notified of new delivery offers, and can take on any new work, but you will also have the capacity to assign work amongst your team as well.

Our commitment to Safety of our community is strong, thanks you for watching this video.

I confirm I will deliver articles containing alcohol in line with RSA guidelines which includes confirming a valid ID for anyone who looks 25 or younger. I will also ensure I will refuse delivery to anyone who is intoxicated.

Does the person you are delivering to look under 25 years?

If yes please ask for a valid ID. Only Driver License, Proof of age or Valid passport is acceptable.

Note: It is illegal to supply alcohol to a minor
Note the maximum fine for supplying alcohol to a minor is $11000 or 12 months imprisonment or both. Don\'t risk it!

"Z2U for carriers is a location based application. We use your location when the app is in background to offer you best suitable and nearby Bookings and also your customers can track their parcels on map too.\nThe Z2U for carriers app doesn't work reliably when Location permission is not granted as \"all-the-time\" Tap here to grant permission or go to Settings."

All deliveries part of this run have not been picked up. Please see depot manager to release the run for delivery if you are missing parcels. Your app won’t work until you scan the release barcode

We are excited to have you part of the platform.

Zoom2u has operated across Australia since 2014 and has processed over 2.5M deliveries.

Along the way we’ve learnt how best for a driver to get stared.

Here are some quick tips to make the most of Zoom2u.

Zoom2u is a platform which connects you to customers who want fast, reliable delivery.

You can choose which bookings you accept or reject. You can also accept multiple bookings at a time.

The key is to accept multiple bookings so you can build a route for the day to increase your earning capacity.

When you hit the ’Online’ button, the system will send your location to our platform automatically. This allows the platform to automatically offer you bookings that are closet to you!

These bookings are offered to the closet driver, who has 20 seconds to accepts.After that, the system will offer the bookings to the next driver, and so on.

So speed to accepting the right booking that fits in with your day, is key.

Maybe think about having your phone hands-free mounted in your car, so it’s easy to the ready and safe?

Also keep in mind where you are located is key to receiving bookings. Most booking may start closer to business hubs in the mornings, so waiting nearby will increase your chance of being offered a bookings first!

Day 1 we recommended accepting a small number of bookings. This way you can get used to the platform.

if you get stuck along the way our team is here to help you.

Just click the call button or whatsapp to ask a questions.

We are here to help.

Increase your earning potential by providing your customers with a great experience.

if you provide a great experience your customers will love you, and they could turn into repeat customer.

if you’re late or rude, your customers may not return.
It may help to let the customer know if you will be late.Communicate is always good.
Finally here are some\nsimple tools that will make\nyour day go easier.
